This is NOT the official DVD, right?

This .ISO is a home-made thing, converted from a .wmv or .mov file...
Hey is this the real DVD or is this just some converted crap?

I finally downloaded this file. Took a while. It is definitely not the official ISO file. But whomever made this one did a nice job on the menu. There are no extras, but the video quality looks like the highest on my tv screen. Its great until we get a hold of the official ISO.

As said before, this is not an official DVD rip. It's probably made from a google video. The motion is somewhat jerky, and the log of my DVD player keeps showing errors. If you want quality, I suggest you look on.
A really capturing DVD from Alex Jones again. I love his work but I dislike what is happening to the world. I hope that the official DVD will come out here soon. I might even buy it from Alex :)

If you like this one check out the rest of his films:
